ingredients.item: ½ x 25g pack fresh flat leaf parsley, finely chopped
½ x 25g pack fresh mint, finely chopped
2 tbsp fresh Waitrose Cooks' Ingredients Greek Basil, leaves only
1 tbsp Farringtonâs Mellow Yellow Rapeseed Oil

instructions.step: 1. Place the potatoes in a large pan of cold water and bring to the boil. Cook for 10 minutes, adding the green beans for the last 5 minutes until both are tender. Drain the vegetables and then set aside to cool completely.
2. In a large bowl, mix the salad onions and chopped parsley and mint with the crÃ¨me fraÃ®che. Add the potatoes and beans and toss gently to combine.
3. Season to taste and serve topped with the Greek basil and drizzled with the rapeseed oil.
